Summary: Set in 1972 New York, this documentary explores John and Yoko's world amid a turbulent era. Centered on the One to One charity concert for special needs children, it features unseen archives, home movies, and restored footage.

Summary: Joe and Kate Ruttledge have returned from London to live and work among the small, close-knit community near to where Joe grew up.
